sentences.en: For several days traffic fromthe Naples airfields was partially interrupted.
sentences.cn: 那不勒斯机场的对外交通部分地停顿了数天.

sentences.en: Her partially clothed body was found in woods nearby.
sentences.cn: 在附近的小树林里发现了她半裸的尸体.

sentences.en: In the lizard, a muscular septum partially divides the ventricle.
sentences.cn: 在虫蜴中, 肌肉质的隔膜把心室部分地隔开.

sentences.en: Lisa is deaf in one ear and partially blind.
sentences.cn: 莉萨一只耳朵失聪，而且部分失明。

sentences.en: Now if a great lake like Victoria were to dry up partially, it would be split into a number of separate, smaller lakes.
sentences.cn: 现在如果像维多利亚湖这样的大湖部分干涸，它就会被分成若干独立的小湖泊。

sentences.en: Please allow me to assure you that you partially misinterpret my emotions.
sentences.cn: 请允许我向你说清楚,你部分地误解了我的感情.

sentences.en: Remember that you are partially responsible for their unhappiness.
sentences.cn: 记住，你对他们的不幸负有部分责任。

sentences.en: She started out, weak as ever , but suddenly her nerve partially returned.
sentences.cn: 她开始往外走, 还是像刚才那么虚弱, 但是她的勇气突然有点恢复了.

sentences.en: Sometimes cars, buildings, and other properties are partially buried.
sentences.cn: 有时候部分车辆 、 房屋和其它财产被掩蔽起来.

sentences.en: Sometimes cars, buildings, and other property are partially buried.
sentences.cn: 有时候部分车辆 、 房屋和其它地产被掩蔽起来.

sentences.en: The door was partially concealed by the drapes.
sentences.cn: 门有一部分被门帘遮住了.

sentences.en: The enzyme has been partially purified from muny bean shoots.
sentences.cn: 从绿豆幼苗中已部分地提纯了这种酶.

sentences.en: The epithelium of the smaller bronchi was fragmented and partially desquamated.
sentences.cn: 较小支气管的上皮破裂和部分脱落.

sentences.en: The operation was only partially successful.
The road was partially blocked by a fallen tree.
sentences.cn: 倒下的一棵树挡住了部分道路。

sentences.en: There was an uneasy basis to his scorn which he partially understood.
sentences.cn: 这轻蔑却并不理直气壮,他自己也有些省觉.

sentences.en: These plants will grow happily in a sunny or partially shaded spot.
sentences.cn: 这些植物在阳光充足或有部分光线照射的地方长势良好。

words.tran_cn: 局部的；偏爱的；不公平的
划分，分开；[数] 分割；隔墙；隔离物
分开（part的过去式及过去分词）
划分（partition的过去分词）；分割；把…分成部分

trans.tran_cn: 部分地，<古>偏袒地，偏爱地，一部分
